title: Levine on The Blues - identify concepts

content.question: Which of the following best describes African American blues music?

choices.label: It originated among African American communities in New Orleans and continues to evolve.
It was created mostly for economic gain as African Americans struggled to acquire job opportunities.
It emerged from slavery as African Americans sought forms of self-expression.
It was used by African Americans as the primary means to protest racism.

content.answer: It emerged from slavery as African Americans sought forms of self-expression.

topic.text: 3.14: Symphony in Black: Black Performance in Music, Theater, and Film

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
